title: Constitution and Structure of Government

vocab.definition: The supreme law of the United States
Dividing government power among three branches
Each branch of government can limit the others' power

teachingNotes: Explain the three branches and their functions. Show how checks and balances prevent any branch from becoming too powerful.

sample.question: What is the supreme law of the United States?

truefalse.question: The Constitution divides government power among three branches.

fillintheblank.question: Each branch limiting the others' power is called ________ and balances.

shortanswer.question: What are the three branches of government?
